function getLinksByFunctionName(control, fn)
    links = {}
    for k,v in pairs(control) do
        if (type(v) == "table") and (type(v.export) == "table") then
            if v[fn] ~= nil then
                links[v.getLocalId()] = v
            end
        end
    end
    return links
end

function setHoverDistance(hoverLinks, dataLinks, reset)
    for _,db in pairs(dataLinks) do
        groundDistance = {}
        groundDistanceString = ""
        if db.hasKey('groundDistance') == 1 then
            if reset == false then
                groundDistanceString = db.getStringValue('groundDistance')
                groundDistance = json.decode(groundDistanceString) or {}
            else
                db.clearValue('groundDistance')
            end
        end
        for k,v in pairs(hoverLinks) do
            groundDistance[tostring(k)] = v.getDistance()
        end
        groundDistanceString = json.encode(groundDistance)
        db.setStringValue('groundDistance', groundDistanceString)
    end
end

hoverLinks = getLinksByFunctionName(unit, 'getDistance')
dataLinks = getLinksByFunctionName(unit, 'getKeys')
